welcome.title: Welcome to Derot My Brain
welcome.intro: The app that transforms your curiosity into active knowledge.

guide.title: Getting Started Guide
guide.purposeText: Stop doomscrolling and start learning. Derot uses your curiosity to help you learn actively from Wikipedia articles.
guide.feature1Text: Discover random Wikipedia articles or choose specific categories to satisfy your curiosity.
guide.feature2Text: Challenge yourself with AI-generated quizzes about the articles you just read.
guide.feature3Text: Keep track of your learning journey, scores, and best performances over time.
guide.feature4Text: Save interesting articles to your backlog to read and quiz yourself on later.
